original: [MAP] Game Starting For 10 Seconds...
[MAP] You will not be able to (compression) the zombies in this map.
zh_trans: [地图] 你无法在此地图刷尸笼.

original: [MAP] If you try to take advantage of the weaknesses of the map and defend it in positions that will squeeze the zombies, the game will teleport you to the beginning.
zh_trans: [地图] 如果你尝试用地图的Bug刷尸笼，地图将把你传送至出生点

original: [MAP] [CT] (Humans Fall Back) If you see this console message, it means there are 5 seconds left until the door opens.
zh_trans: [地图] [CT] (人类撤退) ←如果你看到这个控制台信息，这意味着门还有5秒钟开.

original: [GTA:SA] ZM TP For 5 Seconds
[GTA:SA] GO! GO! GO!
[CT] Humans need to retreat defensively in the long corridor.
zh_trans: [CT] 人类需要在走廊中边守边退

original: [T] Zombies can crawl in through the window, and sneak in through the secret path at the bus stop.
zh_trans: [T] 僵尸可以从窗户上悄悄上来，或者去公交车站的侧路.

original: [GTA:SA] 20 Seconds For Defend (LONG CORRIDOR)
[CT] Break the window and get in, the door is broken. (ADVISOR)
zh_trans: [CT] 破坏窗户然后进去，门已经打开了（建议）

original: [T] Zombies, Break the entrance door (POLICE DEPARTMENT)
[CT] Humans Fall Back
[GTA:SA] 20 Seconds For Defend (STAFF ROOM)
[GTA:SA] YOU CANNOT GO OUTSIDE
[GTA:SA] 20 Seconds For Defend (Lock Gate)
[CT] Humans, be careful, (?) Stay away from the sign.
[T] Zombies, wait outside on the (NISSAN) branded vehicle, the shortcut will open.
zh_trans: [T] 僵尸，在日产车外面等待，侧路很快开放

original: [CT] Humans Go Right! Please do not stand in the (staff room)
zh_trans: [CT] 人类右拐！不要站在员工室里

original: [GTA:SA] 20 Seconds For Defend (VENT)
[T] Zombies, Teleporting For Red Light Place...
[CT+T] The humans and zombies hiding outside were teleported here.
zh_trans: [全部人] 外面躲藏的人类和僵尸将传送到这里

original: [CT] Humans, Follow The Arrows
[CT] Humans, Climb the blocks (Tables) and move forward on the metal above.
zh_trans: [CT] 人类，越过障碍物（桌子），然后沿着金属管道前进

original: [CT] Humans, Don't stop here, the black door will open, shortcut to zombies.
zh_trans: [CT] 人类，别在这里停留！黑色栅栏门很快开启，那是僵尸侧路

original: [GTA:SA] 20 Seconds For Defend (LADDER)
[T] Zombies, Your black door will open in 5 seconds.
[CT] Humans, Go Left!
[CT] Humans, I recommend defending on the 2nd floor, because zombies will teleport to where you are
zh_trans: [CT] 人类，我建议在2楼防守，因为僵尸会在你们所在的地方传送

original: [GTA:SA] 30 Seconds For Defend
[GTA:SA HARD MODE] Okay, you've come so far as a team very well.
zh_trans: [GTA:SA 困难模式] ok，作为一个团队你们已经走了很远了

original: [GTA:SA HARD MODE] But now things have become difficult, there are doors on the right and left, marked Team A and B.
zh_trans: [GTA:SA 困难模式] 但是现在会变得更加困难，你们左右两边有着标记为Team B和Team A的两扇门

original: [GTA:SA HARD MODE] You need to split into 2 teams. If 1 team is invaded by zombies, the game is over.
zh_trans: [GTA:SA 困难模式] 你们需要在这里兵分两路。如果其中一队防守失败，那么游戏结束

original: [GTA:SA HARD MODE] GO! GO! GO!
[B TEAM] Humans, Please Dont Touch Fires!
Died.
[GTA:SA HARD MODE] ZM TP ACTIVATE
zh_trans: [GTA:SA 困难模式] 僵尸传送已激活

original: [GTA:SA HARD MODE] 30 SECONDS... (defend)
[GTA:SA HARD MODE] 20 SECONDS... (defend)
[MISSION FAILED] B TEAM is invaded by Zombies.
zh_trans: [任务失败] B小队防守失败

original: [GTA:SA HARD MODE] 10 SECONDS. Everyone Fall Back
zh_trans: [GTA:SA 困难模式] 还有10秒钟，全部人后撤！

original: [GTA:SA HARD MODE] 5 SECONDS. Door Hug!
zh_trans: [GTA:SA 困难模式] 还有5秒钟，贴门！

original: [GTA:SA HARD MODE] GET IN GREEN LIGHT
zh_trans: [GTA:SA 困难模式] 进入绿灯区域！

original: [MISSION COMPLETED] Game Over
[MISSION FAILED] A TEAM is invaded by Zombies.
zh_trans: [任务失败] A小队防守失败
